segments.text: Hi , I ’ d like a single room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me check if we have any vacancies ... You ’ re in luck.We have one single room available .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: $ 60 a night.No charge for local calls on the phone or for the TV , unless you decide to watch the pay-per-view channels .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here ’ s your key.Check out time is 12 noon.If you want to stay until 6 p . m . , it ’ s another half day.After that you have to pay for another night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s open from 6:30 a.m.to 10 p.m.every day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , thank you.Which way to the room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s that way , on the second floor .
segments.speaker: S2
